mapper.select: SELECT mc.member_id, mc.exp, mc.created_at, mc.updated_at, cl.level_id, cl.name, cl.description, cl.required_exp, cl.image_url FROM member_character mc JOIN character_level cl ON mc.current_level = cl.level_id WHERE mc.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT mc.member_id, mc.exp, mc.created_at, mc.updated_at, cl.level_id, cl.name, cl.description, cl.required_exp, cl.image_url FROM member_character mc JOIN character_level cl ON mc.current_level = cl.level_id WHERE mc.member_id = #{memberId} FOR UPDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_character (member_id, current_level, exp, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{currentLevel}, #{exp}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE member_character SET current_level = #{levelId}, exp = #{exp}, updated_at = now() WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
